title: Revealed: The best and worst places to have your hip operation
text:
The hospitals with the worst results for routine surgery have been revealed, in new league tables comparing the success of hip operations.

Research on 430 hospitals across the UK reveals 10 which are significantly more likely to require operations to be repeated, over the past five years.

Those with the worst results said high levels of infection after surgery, and inadequate supervision of junior doctors were among the reasons for their poor performance.

Others said their results were worse than others because the patients they treated were more likely to be frail or elderly.
